medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset severe epigastric pain radiating to both LUQ and RUQ associated with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely and were severe, keeping her awake all night. The pain was associated with chest pain and reflux symptoms. She has experienced similar pain before, but it was not as severe and did not last as long.
